lead_paragraph: Rodriguez will play his final game Friday at Yankee Stadium against the Rays, with the announcement coming in the midst of a season in which he has hit just .204.

headline.print_headline: Rodriguez Is Stepping Away From Yankees, Without Leaving Them
headline.main: Alex Rodriguez to Retire and Join Yankees as an Adviser

snippet: Rodriguez will play his final game Friday at Yankee Stadium against the Rays, with the announcement coming in the midst of a season in which he has hit just .204....
abstract: New York Yankees infielder Alex Rodriguez is given his release as player but will remain with team as special instructor; deal provides graceful exit for controversial star who no longer figures in franchise's future plans.
